content: this pattern is written instructions only pattern uses u s /american terminology the pattern consists of 8 rounds finished piece will be about 15 cm in diameter from point to point after blocking thread filati loco hook 2 mm **hello every one i hope that wherever you are in the world you will see the newly designed and published snowflake pattern knit it and use it for your christmas decorations you can also teach it and translate it which is the permission i give you for this pattern if you knit it wherever you are be sure to tag me as the designer and mention my name to both support me give credit to my work and encourage me to create more patterns like this **
